name: Jerry Canyon
description:
Approach

The nice, easy start (and exit) to this canyon is on private property.

Descent

There is some sharp rock in this canyon that may have degraded the anchor material for the 3rd stage of the first rappel series.


The 3 stage rappel introduces the canyons with: r1 7m r2 85m r3 40m (follow the watercourse dcl)

Then a 30m rap and the final jump (3-5 m pending where you jumped from).

Exit

You may need to arrange with a local for a "taxi" pick up to return to your vehicle, if you do not have enough to set up the shuttle ahead.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

https://www.chasingadventure29.com/TripReports/Jerry-Canyon
